summary: With this mod you can summon Indrik* Mount and Follower… (The DLC Dragonborn is required)
descriptionHtml:
With this mod you can summon Indrik* Mount and Follower… (The DLC Dragonborn is required)


SSE version: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17787] Indrik Mount and Follower SE[/url]


[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18060404310916616015745710.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/06/04//18060404310916616015745710.jpg[/img][/url]

*[i]"An Indrik will attack ferociously the foe, being able to cast thunders from the sky stomping with his paws, spit poison mists and ice storms, create fire explosions charging at you with his horns and create explosive light orbs that indrik will try to use in order to surround you in a real mine camp.
An indrik can also make fire rocks fall from the sky with his light explosions, teleport himself in order to charge at you from unexpected sides and create Patronums, replicas of himself made of pure ectoplasm, that despite the fact of them being weaker and not having Indrik's elemental powers, can still create explosions of light with their charges"
[/i]


[b]SUMMONABLE MOUNT[/b]



To have the SUMMONABLE Mount, you must buy the “Spell tome: Indrik”, at [b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b] (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

With the book, you have the spell (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell Tome: Dismiss Summoned Indrik"

In order to buy the books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]

If problem with the mount you can try a fast travel



[b][i]Presentation of this mod (XBOX version)[/i]:[/b]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]2giNTPm1Rkk[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-



You have also in this mod an "Armored Indrik", BUT it is a bad armor ! … In the console (only), type: player.placeatme 24032973 or 24032977



[b]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/b]


If Indrik have disappeared when you are riding on it (with impossibility to dismount!) ...

3 solutions to make the creature reappear:

1) Unzoom using the mouse wheel of the mouse
2) Fast travel
3) Enter / leave a house (but you have to be descended from the beast though !!!)



[b]CREDITS[/b]

Mihail Romanov for Indrik in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91734] Indrik- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- ESO- summerset isles) [/url] (« Feel free to use my mod in your projects,no need to ask me for permission first »)
